name: The Castle Of Diavolul - Manaslu Rises
name_original: The Castle Of Diavolul - Manaslu Rises
description: As the horrors of the night take hold within the cold and snowy landscape of the wilderness. Arises, a mountain known by local legend as Mount Manaslu. Legend says that this is a sign of evil within the world; with its sudden arrival, the land turned sour. Sightings of strange monsters lurking within the snowy landscape have brought many legends and soon those within the area start to go missing. Within a matter of days, the village is overrun with nightmarish creatures and now you must find a means of stopping this madness from spreading. You are October Crow; armed with your trusty lantern and sword; you venture to the mountains in the hopes of ridding the world of this evil. There is a story of a staff crafted by the hands of the ancient God known as Mulo. It is said that one who welds it will have the power to move the very earth itself. Perhaps, the Staff Of Mulo has something to do with it?
